articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: 130,000-year-old sand sculpture is world's oldest-known animal art - The Times of India
articles.description: Archaeologists uncover a 130,000-year-old sand sculpture resembling a stingray on South Africa's coast, rewriting the timeline of human art. Predating previous records by 85,000 years, the find suggests early humans engaged in representational art far earlier…
